keyMoments.title: Kibin's Debut
keyMoments.description: Commodore Kibin makes his first appearance as a Marine officer attempting to stop Luffy's advance using Rokushiki techniques.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a mid-tier Marine officer at Marineford.

keyMoments.title: Crocodile Saves Ace from Execution
keyMoments.description: Crocodile unexpectedly intervenes to stop Ace's execution, using his sand powers to strike down the executioners and declaring he doesn't want the Marines to win.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Crocodile's complex motivations and his deep hatred for the World Government, showing he would rather save an enemy's ally than let the Marines succeed.
keyMoments.quote: I can kill Whitebeard later. I don't want them to taste victory.

keyMoments.title: Crocodile vs Doflamingo
keyMoments.description: After being attacked by Doflamingo, Crocodile fights back and insists he teams up with nobody.
keyMoments.significance: Reinforces Crocodile's independent nature and unwillingness to ally with anyone.
keyMoments.quote: I will team up with nobody.

reveals.information: Hates the World Government enough to sabotage their victory, even if it means temporarily helping enemies

name.japanese: エドワード・ニューゲート

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Reveals Coated Ship Strategy
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard unveils his trump card - a hidden coated paddle ship that remained submerged in the bay, demonstrating his tactical genius.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Whitebeard's strategic mind and his thorough planning for rescuing Ace.
keyMoments.quote: I never said all of my ships had surfaced.

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard's Massive Shockwave
keyMoments.description: Upon entering the plaza, Whitebeard unleashes a devastating shockwave attack with his Gura Gura no Mi powers.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Whitebeard's overwhelming power even in his weakened state.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Knocked Down by Kizaru
keyMoments.description: Luffy attempts to break through the admirals in Gear Second but is effortlessly knocked to the ground by Kizaru.
keyMoments.significance: Highlights the vast power gap between Luffy and admiral-level fighters at this point in the story.

keyMoments.title: Saved by Marco
keyMoments.description: After being attacked by Aokiji, Luffy is saved by Marco's intervention.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Whitebeard Pirates supporting Luffy's goal to save Ace.

keyMoments.title: Marco Protects Luffy
keyMoments.description: Marco intervenes at the last moment to kick Aokiji away and save Luffy from being finished off.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the alliance between Whitebeard Pirates and Luffy in rescuing Ace.

keyMoments.title: Oars Jr.'s Sacrifice
keyMoments.description: Despite severe wounds, Oars Jr. uses his last strength to pull the coated paddle ship from the water and propel it into the plaza before falling unconscious.
keyMoments.significance: His sacrifice enables the Whitebeard Pirates to successfully breach the plaza, demonstrating the loyalty Whitebeard inspires.

name.japanese: ドンキホーテ・ドフラミンゴ

keyMoments.title: Doflamingo Attacks Crocodile
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo slices Crocodile's head with his string powers, claiming jealousy that Crocodile appeared to team up with Whitebeard.
keyMoments.significance: Shows conflict among the Warlords and Doflamingo's chaotic nature.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 3 Infiltrates Underground
keyMoments.description: Galdino successfully infiltrates deep into Marineford's underground passages after escaping from Aokiji.
keyMoments.significance: Positions Mr. 3 for a crucial role later in the arc.

keyMoments.title: Sengoku Orders Immediate Execution
keyMoments.description: Sengoku orders Ace's immediate execution as the situation deteriorates with Whitebeard's forces advancing.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the urgency of the battle and forces everyone to race against time.

keyMoments.title: Sengoku Prepares to Fight
keyMoments.description: Sengoku decides he must enter the battle directly alongside Garp to stop Whitebeard's full assault.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how desperate the situation has become that the Fleet Admiral himself must fight.

keyMoments.title: Garp Prepares to Fight
keyMoments.description: Vice Admiral Garp decides to fight alongside Sengoku against Whitebeard's forces.
keyMoments.significance: One of the Marine's legendary fighters prepares to enter the battle directly.

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Ace Saved from Execution by Crocodile
keyMoments.description: Ace is saved at the last moment when Crocodile intervenes to stop the executioners.
keyMoments.significance: Temporarily extends Ace's life and changes the trajectory of the battle.

keyMoments.title: Kizaru Stops Luffy
keyMoments.description: Kizaru effortlessly catches up to Luffy in Gear Second and knocks him to the ground.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates admiral-level power compared to Luffy's current strength.

keyMoments.title: Aokiji Attacks Luffy
keyMoments.description: Aokiji moves to finish off the fallen Luffy but is stopped by Marco's intervention.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the admirals' coordinated effort to prevent Luffy from reaching Ace.
